message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000.  It's a great deal, considering the value it holds for you.  Let me know your thoughts.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to make a reasonable offer, but I'm trying to stay within my budget. Let me know if you're willing to meet me halfway.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $9,000 is just too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $10,500, which is still a great deal for you.  Let's meet in the middle on this.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $10,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $10,250. I hope we can find a mutually agreeable price.
